original_text: In God's Law Moses says that we should throw stones at this kind of woman, to kill her. What do you say about this?’
korean_text: 모세는 율법에 이러한 여자를 돌로 치라 명하였거니와 선생은 어떻게 말하겠나이까

sentences.original_text: that we should throw stones at this kind of woman
sentences.korean_translation: 이런 종류의 여인에게 돌을 던져야 한다고

sentences.original_text: What do you say about this?'
